history.proof: intros. assert (divides q (q * x)) as H1. exists x. lia. assert (divides q (q * y)) as H2. exists y. lia. qsimpl. strivial use: Nat.mul_cancel_l.

exceptions.tactic: intros qneq0 q x y qneq0xy.
intros qneq0 q' x y qneq0xy.
intros qneq0 q' x' y qneq0xy.
intros qneq0 q' x' y' qneq0xy.
apply prime_seq.power_factor_uniq in qneq0xy as [_ qeq].

exceptions.exn: The reference qeq was not found in the current environment.
In environment q, x, y : nat H : q = 0 -> False H0 : q * x = q * y x0 : nat H3 : q * y = x0 * q x1 : nat H2 : q * x = x1 * q Unable to unify "y" with "x".

original: intros qneq0 q x y qneq0xy. assert (divides q (q * x)) as H1. exists x. lia. assert (divides q (q * y)) as H2. exists y. lia. apply prime_seq.power_factor_uniq in qneq0xy as [_ qeq]. rewrite qeq. reflexivity.
